channel.title: Kevin Siembieda on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Kevin Siembieda on Strat

item.title: Rifts Adventure Guide
item.description: 1/2 systems-agnostic tight and informative GMing essays with contributions from half a dozen GMs dropping knowledge bombs dense with decades worth of GMing experience — 1/2 Rifts-specific stuff that I skimmed through but could be mined for some ideas.
